SEARCH

Class Account

java.lang.Object
Account
public class Account extends Object
Account class: Account info handling (display and manage acc info like acc numbers and types). Balance management (check balance, show current, available). Account operations (deposit, withdraw).

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Account(String accNum)
    Constructs an Account object with existing information given the account number exists in file.

  • Constructor Details

    • Account

      public Account(String accNum)
      Constructs an Account object with existing information given the account number exists in file. Else, an account object with default values for attributes are created.
      Parameters:
      accNum - the account number of an account

  • Method Details

    • getAccountNum

      public String getAccountNum()
      Gets the account's number
      Returns:
      the account number

    • setAccountNum

      public void setAccountNum(String newNum)
      Changes account number of an account object to new given number (not likely to be used because account number should not change)
      Parameters:
      newNum - the new account number

    • getTransLimit

      public double getTransLimit()
      Gets the account's transfer limit
      Returns:
      the account's transfer limit

    • setTransferLimit

      public void setTransferLimit(double newLimit)
      Changes account transfer limit to new given limit
      Parameters:
      newLimit - the new transfer limit for an account

    • withdraw

      public void withdraw(double amount)
      Minuses withdrawal amount from account balance. If amount exceeds balance, bank loans remaining funds required. Loan amount is added to account's debt.
      Parameters:
      amount - the amount to be withdrawn from the account

    • deposit

      public void deposit(double amount)
      Adds deposited amount to account balance.
      Parameters:
      amount - the amount to be deposited into the account

    • getBalance

      public double getBalance()
      Gets the account's balance
      Returns:
      the account balance

    • setBalance

      public void setBalance(double amount)
      Sets account balance, used in funds transfer process
      Parameters:
      amount - the amount to set an account's balance to

    • transactionHistory

      Prints an account's transaction history

      interestRate - The interest rate of the loan
